casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 15, 2014

[Cite as 0411512014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1586.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-2026. In re Review of Alternative Energy Rider Contained in Tariffs of Ohio Edison Co.

Public Utilities Commission, No. 11-5201-EL-RDR. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from .the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio.

Upon consideration of the motion for hearing and stay of the briefing schedule of the Office of the Ohio Consumers’ Counsel, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, in part, and the briefing schedule is stayed. The briefing schedule will be reset upon the court’s resolution of the motion to seal.
